title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 3 - Bucky Brooks, Lawrence Pro Day, Chris Broussard
itunes:title: 02/16/2021 - HOUR 3 - Bucky Brooks, Lawrence Pro Day, Chris Broussard
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, FOX Sports and NFL Network analyst Bucky Brooks hops on The Herd to share his reaction to Trevor Lawrence's pro day as well as other hot topics in the NFL. Also, FOX Sports Radio host Chris Broussard checks in with Colin to chat about the Philadelphia 76ers, the Brooklyn Nets, the Anthony Davis injury and other pertinent NBA topics. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
